import React, { Component } from "react"; import { connect } from "react-redux"; import { fetchInvited } from '../actions/invitedAction'; import { fetchDeleteInvited } from '../actions/deleteInvitedAction'; import $ from 'jquery'; class Inviteds extends Component { componentDidMount() { this.props.fetchInvited(this.props.id_event); } deleteInvited(item) { var event_id = this.props.id_event; var invited_id = item.id; this.props.fetchDeleteInvited({event_id, invited_id}); } editInvited(item) { $('.modal-invited').attr('id', item.id); $('.modal-invited [name="email"]').val(item.email); $('.modal-invited [name="first_name"]').val(item.first_name); $('.modal-invited [name="last_name"]').val(item.last_name); $('.modal-invited [name="ddd"]').val(item.ddd); $('.modal-invited [name="telephone"]').val(item.telephone); $('.modal-invited [name="description"]').val(item.description); } render() { const { invited } = this.props; return (

) } } const mapStateToProps = state => ({ deleteInvited: state.deleteInvited, invited: state.invited }) export default connect(mapStateToProps, {fetchInvited, fetchDeleteInvited})(Inviteds);
